article_text:
HCA is scheduled to release first-quarter earnings before the market opens Tuesday. Here’s what you need to know:

EARNINGS FORECAST: The analyst consensus for HCA first-quarter net income per share is $1.49, say those surveyed by Thomson Reuters. The company’s guidance, released in late January, projected adjusted earnings per diluted share of...
